CONCLUSION: Preliminary objection rejected (ratione temporis);Violation of P1-1;No violation of Art. 8;Just satisfaction reserved
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant , a NORP national , grew up in GPE in northern GPE . In DATE she married and moved with her husband to GPE .

CARDINAL . She claims to be the owner of plots of land nos . DATE , CARDINAL , DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL and CARDINAL in GPE in northern GPE and she alleges that prior to the NORP occupation of northern GPE on DATE , work had commenced on plot no . CARDINAL for the construction of flats , CARDINAL of which was intended as a home for her family . Her ownership of the properties is attested by certificates of registration issued by LOC and ORG at the moment of acquisition .
She states that she has been prevented in the past , and is still prevented , by NORP forces from returning to PERSON and " peacefully enjoying " her property .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant participated in a march organised by a women ’s group ( " Women Walk Home " movement ) in the village of Lymbia near the NORP village of PERSON in the occupied area of northern GPE . The aim of the march was to assert the right of NORP refugees to return to their homes .

Leading a group of CARDINAL marchers she advanced up a hill towards ORG in the NORP - occupied part of GPE passing the ORG Nations’ guard post on the way . When they reached the churchyard they were surrounded by NORP soldiers and prevented from moving any further .
CARDINAL . She was eventually detained by members of the NORP police force and brought by ambulance to GPE . She was released TIME , having been detained for TIME .

CARDINAL . In his report of CARDINAL DATE ( ORG document S/CARDINAL ) on ORG in GPE ( for the period DATE ) the Secretary - General of ORG described the demonstration of DATE as follows ( at paragraph CARDINAL ) :

" In DATE , considerable tension occurred over the well - publicized plans of a NORP women ’s group to organize a large demonstration with the announced intention of crossing the NORP forces cease - fire line . In this connection it is relevant to recall that , following violent demonstrations in the ORG buffer - zone in DATE , ORG had given assurances that it would in future do whatever was necessary to ensure respect for the buffer - zone ... Accordingly , ORG asked the Government to take effective action to prevent any demonstrators from entering the buffer - zone , bearing in mind that such entry would lead to a situation that might be difficult to control . The demonstration took place on DATE . CARDINAL women crossed the buffer - zone at ORG and some managed to cross the NORP forces’ line . A smaller group crossed that line at GPE . At PERSON , a large number of NORP women arrived shortly after the NORP Cypriots and mounted a counter demonstration , remaining however on their side of the line . Unarmed NORP soldiers opposed the demonstrators and , thanks largely to the manner in which they and the NORP police dealt with the situation , the demonstration passed without serious incident . Altogether , CARDINAL demonstrators were arrested by NORP police in the QUANTITY locations ; they were released to ORG DATE . "

CARDINAL . NORP armed forces of CARDINAL personnel are stationed throughout the whole of the occupied area of northern GPE , which is constantly patrolled and has checkpoints on all main lines of communication . The army ’s headquarters are in GPE . ORG is based in PERSON ( PERSON ) with its sector covering GPE to the PERSON Milia suburb of GPE and with CARDINAL personnel . ORG , with CARDINAL personnel , is based at GPE village , and its sector ranges from GPE village to GPE . ORG ( NORP Forces in GPE under LAW ) is stationed at GPE near GPE , with a sector running from FAC to LOC . A NORP naval command and outpost are based at GPE and PERSON respectively . NORP airforce personnel are based at PERSON , PERSON and other airfields . The NORP airforce is stationed on the NORP mainland at GPE .

CARDINAL . The NORP forces and all civilians entering military areas are subject to NORP military courts , as stipulated so far as concerns " GPE citizens " by ORG of DATE ( section CARDINAL ) and LAW TRNC " .
CARDINAL . LAW b ) of the CARDINAL DATE LAW of the " GPE " ( the " TRNC " ) provides , where relevant , as follows :

" All immovable properties , buildings and installations which were found abandoned on DATE when ORG of GPE was proclaimed or which were considered by law as abandoned or ownerless after the above - mentioned date , or which should have been in the possession or control of the public even though their ownership had not yet been determined ... and ... situated within the boundaries of the GPE on DATE , shall be the property of the GPE notwithstanding the fact that they are not so registered in the books of ORG ; and ORG shall be amended accordingly . "
CARDINAL . On DATE , in response to the proclamation of the establishment of the " TRNC " , ORG adopted Resolution CARDINAL ( DATE ) which provides , where relevant , as follows :
" ORG ...
CARDINAL . Deplores the declaration of the NORP authorities of the purported secession of part of GPE ;
CARDINAL . Considers the declaration ... as legally invalid and calls for its withdrawal ...
CARDINAL . Calls upon all GPE to respect the sovereignty , independence , territorial integrity and non - alignment of GPE ;
CARDINAL . Calls upon all GPE not to recognise any ORG other than GPE ... "
CARDINAL . LAW ( DATE ) , adopted on CARDINAL DATE in response to the exchange of " ambassadors " between GPE and the " GPE " stated , inter alia :
" ORG ...
CARDINAL . ORG its Resolution MONEY ( DATE ) and calls for its urgent and effective implementation ;

CARDINAL . Condemns all secessionist actions , including the purported exchange of ambassadors between GPE and the NORP leadership , declares them illegal and invalid and calls for their immediate withdrawal ;

CARDINAL . Reiterates the call upon all GPE not to recognise the purported ORG of the " GPE " set up by secessionist acts and calls upon them not to facilitate or in any way assist the aforesaid secessionist entity ;
CARDINAL . Calls upon all GPE to respect the sovereignty , independence , territorial integrity , unity and non - alignment of GPE ... "

CARDINAL . In DATE , ORG decided that it continued to regard the Government of GPE as the sole legitimate Government of GPE and called for the respect of the sovereignty , independence , territorial integrity and unity of GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG issued the following statement :

" The ten Member States of the European Community are deeply concerned by the declaration purporting to establish a ‘ Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus’ as an independent ORG . They reject this declaration , which is in disregard of successive resolutions of ORG . The CARDINAL reiterate their unconditional support for the independence , sovereignty , territorial integrity and unity of GPE . They continue to regard the Government of President PERSON as the sole legitimate Government of GPE . They call upon all interested parties not to recognize this act , which creates a very serious situation in the area . "
CARDINAL . The Commonwealth Heads of Government , meeting in GPE from CARDINAL to CARDINAL DATE , issued a press communiqué stating , inter alia , as follows :

" [ The ] Heads of Government condemned the declaration by the NORP authorities issued on DATE to create a secessionist state in northern GPE , in the area under foreign occupation . Fully endorsing ORG CARDINAL , they denounced the declaration as legally invalid and reiterated the call for its non - recognition and immediate withdrawal . They further called upon all GPE not to facilitate or in any way assist the illegal secessionist entity . They regarded this illegal act as a challenge to the international community and demanded the implementation of the relevant ORG on GPE . "
CARDINAL . On DATE , the NORP Minister for ORG deposited the following declaration with the Secretary General of ORG pursuant to LAW ( article CARDINAL ) :
" On behalf of ORG and acting in accordance with LAW article DATE ) of LAW , I hereby declare as follows :

The Government of the Republic of Turkey acting in accordance with LAW article DATE ) of LAW , hereby recognises as compulsory ipso facto and without special agreement the jurisdiction of ORG in all matters concerning the interpretation and application of the LAW which relate to the exercise of jurisdiction within the meaning of LAW ( article CARDINAL ) , performed within the boundaries of the national territory of GPE , and provided further that such matters have previously been examined by the Commission within the power conferred upon it by GPE .

This Declaration is made on condition of reciprocity , including reciprocity of obligations assumed under LAW . It is valid for DATE as from the date of its deposit and extends to matters raised in respect of facts , including judgments which are based on such facts which have occurred subsequent to the date of deposit of the present Declaration . "
CARDINAL . The above declaration was renewed for DATE as from DATE in substantially the same terms .
